name: Battlecruisers
description:
Build the ultimate war machine in Battlecruisers, the awe-infested 2D real-time strategy game from New Zealand. The distinctive hand-drawn style proves that fun games can also be beautiful, with stunning skies providing the canvas for the explosive gameplay.

Orchestrate your own floating fortress and decide how to attack and defend against frigates, destroyers and bombers sent by enemy cruisers.



Reinforce your defence with shields and boosters and enhance your production speed with builder drones. Use creative strategies to lure your enemy into a tactical trap, and outmaneuvre them with fighters, gunships and fast attack boats.



Your weaponry has awesome destructive power and includes death star satellites, nuclear rockets, long-range artillery, and an ever-expanding list of experimental ultra-weapons.



When the sea levels rose, the world divided. People now live on floating cities, competing for receding pockets of land, scorched barren by the ever heating climate. Enemies wage war with their immense floating fortresses: Battlecruisers.



  • Discover and unlock mysterious Ultraweapons, capable of finishing the game in a single strike: The Mann o' War battleship, the Ultralisk rapid fabrication facility, the Kamikaze Signal, and more.
  • Launch a fleet of bomber aircraft, decimating your enemy from the skies with a hail of napalm bombs.


  • Build long-range destroyer ships to take out your opponent from afar with missile batteries.
  • Engage stealth technology so your opponent can't see what you’re building. Then surprise them with a nuke to the face!


  • Turtle up with shields and defence turrets, then use long-range artillery to send your enemy to the bottom of the sea.
  • Original music score that seamlessly matches the action and lulls of each battle.


  • Unlock more than 30 unique buildings and units, and many more to come assuming we make enough sales to work full time (that's the plan :) )
  • Develop sneaky strategies to overcome the progressively more difficult AI cruisers.
